resources.name: Get Characters
resources.description:
Returns json data with every single character on the database.
  
  The JSON will include meta information such as total, current_page, last_page, and more. The result records are available via the data key in the JSON array. Here is an example of the JSON:
```json
{
   "total": 50,
   "per_page": 15,
   "current_page": 1,
   "last_page": 4,
   "first_page_url": "https://dextra.com.br?page=1",
   "last_page_url": "https://dextra.com.br?page=4",
   "next_page_url": "https://dextra.com.br?page=2",
   "prev_page_url": null,
   "path": "https://dextra.com.br",
   "from": 1,
   "to": 15,
   "data":[
        {
            // Record...
        },
        {
            // Record...
        }
   ]
}
```

* **URL**

  /characters

* **Method:**

  `GET`
  
*  **URL Params**

   **Optional:**
 
   `house=[uuid]` - Filters characters by house

* **Data Params**

  None

* **Success Response:**

  * **Code:** 200
 
* **Error Response:**

  * **Code:** 422 Unprocessable Entity -
  If the provided house query string does not exist.
 * **Standard Error Response:**
https://jsonapi.org/examples/#error-objects-invalid-query-parameters

resources.name: Get Character
resources.description:
Returns json data of a specific character.
  
```json
{
  "data": {
    "id": "fa80dc60-ffa7-41fd-b6df-f7c57a0a07f3",
    "name": "Hermione Granger",
    "role": "student",
    "school": "Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry",
    "house": "1760529f-6d51-4cb1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "patronus": "cat"
  }
}
```

* **URL**

  /characters/{id}

* **Method:**

  `GET`

* **Success Response:**

  * **Code:** 200
 
* **Error Response:**

  * **Code:** 404 Not Found -
  If the provided id does not exists.
  * **Standard Error Response:**
https://jsonapi.org/examples/#error-objects-invalid-query-parameters

resources.name: Create Character
resources.description:
Store a character in the database.
  The return will be the newly created character stored information.
  
Input:
```json
{
  "data": {
    "name": "Hermione Granger",
    "role": "student",
    "school": "Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry",
    "house": "1760529f-6d51-4cb1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "patronus": "cat"
  }
}
```

Output:
```json
{
  "data": {
    "id": "17605asf-6d51-4dd1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "name": "Hermione Granger",
    "role": "student",
    "school": "Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry",
    "house": "1760529f-6d51-4cb1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "patronus": "cat"
  }
}
```

* **URL**

  /characters

* **Method:**

  `POST`

* **Success Response:**

  * **Code:** 201
 
* **Error Response:**

  * **Code:** 422 Unprocessable Entity -
  If any provided value is invalid.
  
* **Standard Error Response:**
https://jsonapi.org/examples/#error-objects-invalid-query-parameters

body.text:
{
    "name": "Harry Potter",
    "role": "student",
    "school": "Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry",
    "house": "1760529f-6d51-4cb1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "patronus": "stag"
}

resources.name: Update Character
resources.description:
Update a character in the database.
  The return will be the update character information.
  
Input:
```json
{
  "data": {
    "id": "17605asf-6d51-4dd1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "name": "Hermione Diva",
    "role": "student",
    "school": "Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry",
    "house": "1760529f-6d51-4cb1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "patronus": "cat"
  }
}
```

Output:
```json
{
  "data": {
    "id": "17605asf-6d51-4dd1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "name": "Hermione Diva",
    "role": "student",
    "school": "Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry",
    "house": "1760529f-6d51-4cb1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "patronus": "cat"
  }
}
```

* **URL**

  /characters/{ID}

* **Method:**

  `PATCH`

* **Success Response:**

  * **Code:** 200
 
* **Error Response:**

  * **Code:** 422 Unprocessable Entity -
  If any provided value is invalid.
  
  OR
  
   * **Code:** 404 Not Found -
  If the provided character ID is not found on the database.
  
* **Standard Error Response:**
https://jsonapi.org/examples/#error-objects-invalid-query-parameters

body.text:
{
    "name": "Hermione Granger",
    "role": "student",
    "school": "Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry",
    "house": "1760529f-6d51-4cb1-bcb1-25087fce5bde",
    "patronus": "cat"
}

resources.name: Delete Character
resources.description:
Remove the character from the database.
  The return will be the update character information.

* **URL**

  /characters/{ID}

* **Method:**

  `DELETE`

* **Success Response:**

  * **Code:** 204
 
* **Error Response:**
  
   * **Code:** 404 Not Found -
  If the provided character ID is not found on the database.
  
* **Standard Error Response:**
https://jsonapi.org/examples/#error-objects-invalid-query-parameters
